Vote Instructions (Read Carefully) Info: In order to get the maximum of the rewards for voting, you need to Vote in all Banners on our Website (WWW.L2Mythras.Eu). After Voting successfully you can type .vote ingame to claim your Rewards (Vote Coins as a Standard Reward & 1 or 2 items from the Random Category). Voting is the most important thing for our Server and every Server. Voting for us will bring more players and it'll give you a better Gameplay.

Reward List (Standard & Random Rewards) Standard Reward with 100% Chance: 2 to 5 Vote Coins Random Reward with 5% Chance: 1 Scroll Blessed Enchant Weapon S Random Reward with 5% Chance: 1 Scroll Blessed Enchant Armor S Random Reward with 3% Chance: 1 Soul Crystall Stage 16 (Red/Blue/Green) Random Reward with 5% Chance: 1 Soul Crystall Stage 15 (Red/Blue/Green) Random Reward with 8% Chance: 1 Top LS Level 84 Random Reward with 15% Chance: 1 High LS Level 84 Random Reward with 15% Chance: 1 Giant's Codex - Mastery Random Reward with 18% Chance: 1 Scroll Enchant Weapon S Random Reward with 26% Chance: 1 Scroll Enchant Armor S Random Reward with 80% Chance: 1 Attribute Stone (All Kinds) Random Reward with 40% Chance: 1 Attribute Crystal (All Kinds)

Vote Coins Info: You can exchange Vote Coins for extra Rewards. Click the button on the Right to claim your Vote Gifts.
